author: By Emma Munbodh
title: Thomson Holidays best late deals including Menorca, Tenerife and Ibiza
text:
Are you after a last minute holiday on a budget? Those after a cheap escape can take advantage of some tempting offers this season.
Read on for some of the best late deals from Thomson Holidays to Menorca, the Grand Canaria and more flying from the UK.
For more holiday deals and hacks, see our Tripadvisor bargain flights guide , or our cheap holidays page for up-to-the minute sales.
Going on a city break? Here are 10 places to visit, and how to do it for less .
Menorca, £541 per person, half board
Thomson is offering seven-nights in Menorca staying at the 4-star Fiesta Hotel Castell Playa on a half board basis from £541 per person.
Price is based on two adults sharing and includes flights departing from Glasgow airport on 14 August 2015 and transfers.
To find out more about this holiday or to book click here .
Tenerife, £546 per person, bed and breakfast
Thomson is offering seven night holidays to Tenerife staying at the 3-star Vanilla Garden Hotel on a bed and breakfast basis from £546 per person.
Price is based on two adults sharing, and includes flights departing from Edinburgh airport on 14 August 2015 and transfers.
To find out more about this holiday or to book visit Thomson Holidays here .
Gran Canaria, £587 per person, all inclusive
Thomson is offering seven-night holidays to the Grand Canaria staying at the 4-star Hotel Taurito Princess on all inclusive basis from £587 per person.
Price is based on two adults sharing, and includes flights departing from Norwich airport on 16 July 2015 and transfers.
To find out more about this holiday or to book click here .
Ibiza, £697 per person, all inclusive
Thomson is offering seven night holidays to Ibiza staying at the 4-star Insotel Tarida Playa on an all-inclusive basis from £697 per person.
Price is based on two adults sharing, and includes flights departing from London Luton airport on 8 July 2015 and transfers.
To find out more about this holiday or to book click here .
Malia, £141 per person, self catering Getty Images
Thomson is offering seven-night holidays to Malia, staying at 2-star Hotel Ilios on a self catering basis from £141 per person.
Price is based on two adults sharing and includes flights departing from Leeds Bradford airport on 14 July 2015 and transfers.
To find out more about this holiday or to book visit Thomson Holidays here .
